channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32754|2024-07-04T10:46:41.686Z -- johnson%20controls -- kantech%20kt1%20door%20controller%2C%20rev01
item.description: Under certain circumstances, when the controller is in factory reset mode waiting for initial setup, it will broadcast its MAC address, serial number, and firmware version. Once configured, the controller will no longer broadcast this information.

item.title: CVE-2024-32757|2024-07-02T14:02:15.247Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances unnecessary user details are provided within system logs

item.title: CVE-2024-32932|2024-07-02T14:08:17.013Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-0912|2024-06-06T13:29:07.270Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Microsoft® Internet Information Server (IIS) used to host the C•CURE 9000 Web Server will log Microsoft Windows credential details within logs. There is no impact to non-web service interfaces C•CURE 9000 or prior versions

item.title: CVE-2024-32752|2024-06-07T16:15:20.239Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20istar%20pro%2C%20icu
item.description: Under certain circumstances communications between the ICU tool and an iSTAR Pro door controller is susceptible to Machine-in-the-Middle attacks which could impact door control and configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-32756|2024-07-02T13:53:18.769Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Linux users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-32755|2024-07-02T13:38:41.336Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface will accept characters unrelated to the expected input.

item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.
